quotes.quote: Worship is transcendent wonder.
Real worship is that of the heart.
Worship is love responding to love.
Worship comes from a thankful heart.
Worship is adoring contemplation of God.
The worship of power is an old religion.
Worship is admiration becoming adoration.
Worship is when we give God His breath back.
The worship of safety emasculates greatness.
Worship is a way of seeing the world in the light of God.
It is only when men begin to worship that they begin to grow.
We need worship for our spirit, fellowship for our soul and committed subservience for our body.
To worship the product and ignore its development leads to dilettantism and reaction.
He who desires to worship God must harbor no childish illusions about the matter but bravely renounce his liberty and humanity.
When we really worship anything, we love not only its clearness but its obscurity. We exult in its very invisibility.
The instinct to worship is hardly less strong than the instinct to eat.
Genius worship is the inevitable sign of an uncreative age.
We worship education but hate learning. We worship success but hate the successful. We worship fame but hate the famous.
True worship doesn't keep looking at its watch.
The man who worships mere wealth is a snob.
If worship bores you, you are not ready for heaven.
Worship renews the spirit as sleep renews the body.
Worship your heroes from afar; contact withers them.
Worship is giving God the best that He has given you.
Real worship involves waiting.
Worship is an attitude expressed.
Worship the Silent Space in you.
We worship God through our questions.
Worship is the launching pad for life.
In worship, God imparts himself to us.
